title: How to group a 4-weights opentype font, incl Italics?
content:
Hey Fellows,

I have a little question for you: How do I group a 4-weights opentype font, incl Italics? (I use of course FL...)  
That's all ;-)

Best,  
Morten
author: morten

comments.content:
Hi Morten,

take a look at [Adam's hints over at Fontlab group](http://web.archive.org/web/20140807063406/http:/groups.msn.com/FontLab/tipsandtricks.msnw?action=get_message&mview=0&ID_Message=2843&LastModified=4675642576108096343),
